full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Title

*SBIPS SA 1: Business Transformation*

*SPICS AMA 1: Transformation des affaires*

## Reference Number

PW-22-01013294

## Solicitation Number

P2300162

## Amendment Number

2

## Tender Status

Expired

## Publication and Closing Dates

*Publication Date:* 2022-11-11
*Tender Closing Date:* 2022-12-05T09:00:00

## Classification

*GSIN:* D302A - Informatics Professional Services
*UNS Percy NPC SPic:* None

## Procurement Category

SRV

## Type of Procurement

Competitive - Limited Tendering

## Contracting Entity

Women and Gender Equality Canada (WAGE)

## Business Need

WAGE requires a project manager with Scrum certification to oversee the planning, user-centered design, and implementation of its new grants and contributions management system. The system will use the Treasury Board Secretariat approved solution, Power Platform. The new system is expected to support WAGE's objectives in moving to the next generation of grants and contributions management.

## Required Capabilities

The requirements include:

* Project management with Scrum certification
* User-centered design
* Implementation of power platform based solutions
* Familiarity with treasury board secretariat approved solutions
* Compliance with Common PS SRCL #06 security requirements

## Canadian Content and Trade Agreements

The requirement is limited to Canadian goods and services. Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies.

## Duration of Contract

The proposed period of contract shall be from contract award to March 31, 2024.

## Contact Information

Inquiries regarding this RFP shall be submitted to:

Kevin Rodrigues
FEGC.Contrats-Contracts.WAGE@fegc-wage.gc.ca
343-552-6182
P.O. Box 8097, Station T CSC, Ottawa, ON K1G 3H6, Canada
Documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the Identified Suppliers who are being invited to bid on this requirement. 

(Bidders Advised To Note - for information only.) CANADABUYS.GC.CA is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

## Selection Criteria

 None

## Proposal Documents

 Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly to the identified suppliers. Note that bidders may also contact the Contracting Authority for additional information.
